channel.title: Is private survers illigal?
channel.description: i want to make one but i hear there illigal if they are then why?

item.title: Is private survers illigal?
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis955 Nemesis955
item.description:
@Nemesis955 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:1, topic:324969”][quote author=Pure Demons link=topic=421080.msg3093886#msg3093886 date=1263111601]

Yes private servers can get you to go to jail for life because they are felonys.

You’re a fucking idiot.

No, Private Servers will get you shot, why do you think famous rappers such as Tupac and Biggy Smalls got shot? They had private servers.

Fucking tool. Keep misguiding these people and when they get shot it’ll be on your conscience.

Lmfao, that’s funny. They most likely won’t find out about small servers, but big ones, like Dodian WAS that have .com names or something.
[/quote]THEY HAVEN’T NOTICED PANDASCAPE YET. MY SERVER IS IN THE GREEN AREA DAWG.

[quote author=Nemesis955 link=topic=421080.msg3094251#msg3094251 date=1263146339]How do you do the quote thingy Lol?

~Nemesis955
[/quote]You have to press Quote at the top right corner of the post.[/quote]

Ah okay thanks.

~Nemesis955

item.title: Is private survers illigal?
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

For my country, yes.

12.1.8 Copyright infringers are therefore those who do any of the above acts(I didn't include it) without the copyright owner’s consent. The owner’s rights are also infringed by such acts (‘secondary infringements’) as ...

Anyway, before setting up your own private server, you have to know your own country’s laws(according to someone in a similar thread) should Jagex take action on you.

Read full topic

item.title: Is private survers illigal?
item.dc:creator: @S_E_R_B S E R B
item.description:
@S_E_R_B wrote:

All Jagex will do is tell you to remove it and then if you deny that and dont remove it then they will be starting to fine or sue you. They wont just randomly sue you without warning you first. And I still havent even heard of one private server getting sued.

Read full topic

item.title: Is private survers illigal?

item.description:
@surfer25 wrote:

[quote=“imsokool22, post:14, topic:324724”]to tell you people who think you are so smart…
562+ can get you sued because they are an exact copy of rs 525- cant because they dont have the same interface as runescape so no 317-525 wont get you sued no stfu this isnt the general dissuction thats wher this belongs not the server section this has no help this is a just a generl question about rsps’s[/quote]

I hope your been a troll otherwise your stupidity is just huge! You can get “sued” for any revision of Runescape. If not why do alot of 317 servers get removed?

item.title: Is private survers illigal?
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:12, topic:324724”][quote author=bigcasey123 link=topic=421080.msg3092898#msg3092898 date=1263046953]
oh shut up biggie smalls was killed because of a north and west thing he was killed in califona so shut up.and topac to.smalls was from new york thats the north and topac was from the west they got into a stupid fight and topac was killed then biggy was.
[/quote][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=421080.msg3092861#msg3092861 date=1263039987]

Yes private servers can get you to go to jail for life because they are felonys.

You’re a fucking idiot.
[/quote][quote author=surfer25 link=topic=421080.msg3092766#msg3092766 date=1263027108]

Yes private servers can get you to go to jail for life because they are felonys.

For life? Your an idiot. Rapists and some murders and felonies such as that don’t even go to Jail for life.

Our source code, no. The stuff we take from Jagex, yes.

If you can’t find out why the stuff that’s illegal is illegal, please feel free to forget your password.

Our source yes. Because we use a copy-righted protocol. The most JAGEX will do to your server will tell you to remove it. I highly doubt any server will be sued, when a DMCA notice all they need to do
[/quote]

It’s called a troll. Don’t feed him.

@OP

Go ahead and do it, nothing is going to happen.[/quote]

Obvious troll is obvious.

Read full topic
